world.constructs.blocks

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.constructs.blocks.Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clippable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barrier, BGBlock, BlockTemplate, Clay, Grass, Sail, Stone, Teapot, Wood

    public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
implements Clippable
    Author:
    Michael Ferolito Common superclass for all Blocks. When created, forms a "GRASS BLOCK"

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected MVector mv
      The position vector.
      protected double size
      The size of the Block.
      static boolean TESSELATION_ON
      If enabled, suggests that Block and all supporting subclasses attempt to smooth lighting by adding additional vertices to each area.
      (package private) double x
      The Block's coordinates in three dimensional space.
      (package private) double y
      The Block's coordinates in three dimensional space.
      (package private) double z
      The Block's coordinates in three dimensional space.

    • Field Detail

      • TESSELATION_ON

        public static boolean TESSELATION_ON
        If enabled, suggests that Block and all supporting subclasses attempt to smooth lighting by adding additional vertices to each area.

    • Method Detail

      • fromDoubleCoords

        public static Block fromDoubleCoords(double x2,
                                     double y2,
                                     double z2)
        Creates a new block from the specified coordinates. The actual coordinates are half of what is given, hence the name. This is a factory constructor.
        Parameters:
        x2 -
        y2 -
        z2 -
